message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $95 for it. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations and budget.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I believe that's a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value and my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of that, I am willing to consider $87 as the price for the product. I hope this offer better aligns with your expectations while still reflecting the value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $82 for the product. I hope this is more acceptable to you.
